sys_ux_client_script.name: Create Order Custom

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_df42cf994752b110036bbce5536d4310
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create default">17a5db00479a3110036bbce5536d43f5</macroponent><name>Create Order Custom</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (api.context.props.sysId == "" || api.context.props.sysId == null || api.context.props.sysId === undefined || api.context.props.sysId === '-1') {
        let date_ob = new Date();
        // adjust 0 before single digit date
        let date = ("0" + date_ob.getDate()).slice(-2);
        // current month
        let month = ("0" + (date_ob.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2);
        // current year
        let year = date_ob.getFullYear();
        // current hours
        let hours = date_ob.getHours();
        // current minutes
        let minutes = date_ob.getMinutes();
        // current seconds
        let seconds = date_ob.getSeconds();
        // prints date & time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format
        var order_date = (year + "-" + month + "-" + date + " " + hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + seconds);
        api.data.create_order.execute({
            table: 'sn_ind_tmt_orm_order',
            templateFields: 'account=' + api.state.account.id + '^contact=' + api.state.contact.id + '^' + "order_date=" + order_date + "^order_category=" + api.context.props.category + "^order_type=" + api.context.props.type,
            useSetDisplayValue: null
        });


        {
            var route = 'select';
            var fields = {
                'sysId': api.context.props.sysId,
                'category': 'product', //api.context.props.category,
                'type': 'add', //api.context.props.type,
                'orderNumber': api.state.orderNumber
            };
            
            if (api.context.props.type == "change" || api.context.props.type == "disconnect"){
                var route = 'invt_select';
            }
            var payload = {
                route: route,
                fields: fields
            };
            console.log('payload : ' + JSON.stringify(payload));
            api.emit('SN_NAVIGATE_TO_STEP_12345', payload);
        }
    }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-03 16:38:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>df42cf994752b110036bbce5536d4310</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Order Custom</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_df42cf994752b110036bbce5536d4310</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-03 16:38:21</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
